description: Source code for a React-based Tic Tac Toe game, including components for the game board, squares, and game logic, with functions for winner calculation and game state management.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component rendering the Tic Tac Toe game interface, managing game state, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: Component rendering the 3x3 grid of squares, handling click events for each square.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: Component rendering a single square as a button, representing a cell in the game grid.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Function determining if a player has won the game based on current board state.
